fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • We used the wrong picture to illustrate a story about the death of the former Anglican bishop Peter Ball (Ex-bishop who was jailed for sexual abuse dies aged 87, 24 June, page 18). The image was not of Ball, as the caption said, but of the former archbishop of Canterbury George Carey. We would like to apologise for the error. • Other recently corrected articles include: Teachers to strike at Essex school facing conversion to academy Jordan Peterson launches anti-censorship site Thinkspot
